sections.Focus on the Khachkar: The Khachkar should be the main object in the video and be always centered.
sections.Capture the whole object: The Khachkar should be recorded from all angles, so the 3D model can be generated correctly.

sections.Illumination: Avoiding shadows isn't a requirement, but you must be able to see all the object's colors clearly.
sections.Avoid objects in between: If there is an object between the camera and the Khachkar, it could be included in the 3D model.

sections.Go to the add Khachkar section: Once you are logged in, go to the add Khachkar section by clicking its button in the Navigation bar.

sections.Add the video: Click the 'Upload video' button and select the video you want to upload.

sections.Go to 'View Khachkars' section by clicki: In this section you can view all khachkars and filter those that are your property. Also you can edit the data of the khachkars that you own (or mesh them).
